name: AssetlessMarioLikePlatformer
description:
This is a Asset less Simple Mario Platformer

This prototype is a simple replica of Mario game within Unity Engine, featuring basic mechanics found in the game from a perspective of someone who never played Mario games.

The entire project can be downloaded here as an executable to check it out.

Alternatively it is possible to copy the repository from github to get access to all the files. I would like to add that I do not own any rights to Mario games, this is purely for educational purposes. My aim with these prototypes is to show how this can be done and in turn learn how to be better programmer myself as I constantly find new techniques while streaming these little segments on Twitch.

The project will feature Version 2 at some point which will add 2 player, but that is in far future for now this project is marked as finished and is on hold. I will be streaming my next series from 15/03/2021 on Twitch.

For the sound within the project I used the following site:

https://www.spriters-resource.com/nes/supermariobros/

They have sprites/sounds anything mario related.

I stream Monday to Friday from 10-11 GMT+0, The streams are fully uploaded to my Youtube 1 week after the streaming date.  I do not prepare when I stream in advance however I do sometimes do some small elements off camera such as bug fixing or reworking some mechanics, the aim of the streams is to show how one can quickly make a basic mechanic that works in a real scenario.

Game instructions:

Space - Jump

A/D - Left Right

W/S - Secret

Alternatively xbox controller can also be used.
